content:
TITLE: Previewing Documentation Changes
DESCRIPTION: Command to run local documentation preview server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run docs:watch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Local Documentation Preview in Node.js
DESCRIPTION: This command starts a local server to preview the documentation changes in real-time. It's useful for authors who are writing or editing the Defender documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run docs:watch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install project dependencies using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Git Repository for Defender Docs
DESCRIPTION: Commands for forking and setting up the local repository with proper remote configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Clone your fork of the repo into the current directory
git clone https://github.com/<your-username>/defender-docs.git
# Navigate to the newly cloned directory
cd defender-docs
# Assign the original repo to a remote called "upstream"
git remote add upstream https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Local Repository from Upstream
DESCRIPTION: Commands to sync local repository with the latest changes from the upstream main branch.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git checkout main
git pull upstream main
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Merging Upstream Changes
DESCRIPTION: Command to merge or rebase changes from upstream main branch into local topic branch.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git pull [--rebase] upstream main
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Pushing Changes to Fork
DESCRIPTION: Command to push local topic branch changes to fork repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git push origin <topic-branch-name>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Feature Branch
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a new topic branch for feature development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/defender-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git checkout -b <me>
```
